_sText:
**Map made by StyleZ.**

**History**

This map was made for M.I.A. Jailbreak in 2008 but since it was outdated as a jailbreak map I decided to remake it and this is what I came up with. Very similar to the original with the same games and cell design.

**Features**
The map has


- 8 CT slots

- 52 T slots

- 2 T's per cell

- 1 random gun spawner in cells

- Random gun spawns around the map so every round is different

- Cafeteria

- Football Pitch

- Running Track

- Secret hole in the wall so T's can escape

- Sniper Towers
